jsimple.oauth.exceptions

Class OAuthException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • jsimple.util.BasicException
            • jsimple.oauth.exceptions.OAuthException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OAuthConnectionException, OAuthParametersMissingException

    public class OAuthException
extends BasicException
    Default scribe exception. Represents a problem in the OAuth signing process
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
